item.title: About
item.description: Analyst / R Developer and data science hopeful. I’m interested in sharing and supporting opinionated analysis, adventures in R and humane, ethical applications of machine learning. I’m also a collector/selector of dusty records and a player/admirer of The Beautiful Game™. Please hit me up with your fire veggie recipes, too.
